FT: #canWNT 3 - 2 Mexico. That's a career for Rhian Wilkinson, Melissa Tancredi and Marie-Eve Nault. What careers they were.
Melissa Tancredi had a very strong 2016. Nice to see her go out on a high note. #canWNT
Melissa Tancredi in, Deanne Rose out. Cap No. 125 for Tancredi. 15ish minutes left as a current member of #canWNT.
Jessie Fleming's getting cheeky. Have to admire that. #CanWNT
Oouf. D'Angelo's not happy about that one. #canWNT 3 - 2 Mexico thanks to Seattle Reign's Kaitlyn Johnson.
Rhian Wilkinson in, Josee Belanger out. Wilkinson's 181st and final cap for #canWNT.
Considering @menault20 told @sprusina going to the gym was one of the toughest parts of post-soccer life, she's doing well tonight. #canWNT

The last penalty I remember #canWNT taking was vs. China in first game of #FIFAWWC. Injury time, rookie reporter, on deadline. Sure was fun.
Sinclair tripped in box, Janine Beckie scores her second on the penalty. #canWNT
.@LukeWileman says some #canWNT players who have retired since '12 will be honoured @ HT. Nice touch from @CanadaSoccerEN
Beckie gets #canWNT's second. Get used to that, too. Nice build up from Canada. Think the shot might've been helped on by turf.
Sinclair's dropped significantly as of late, & the distributor role looks good on her, but her nose for goal is undeniable. #canWNT
Quick response from Mexico. Sloppy defending from #canWNT but boy, Antonio hit that sweetly into the bottom corner. We've got a game. 1-1
Deanne Rose opens the scoring. Get used to that, I'd say. #canWNT 1-0 Mexico.
Wondering where you've seen Sarah Stratigakis in terms of local, main stream media coverage? She was part of the Pan Am Games team in '15.
Competition-wise: #canWNT is ranked No.4 in the world. Mexico is No.26. Still a game Canada wants to win.
